title: Second Thoughts
description: The long-awaited next chapter in the Victoria Wilde series, Second Thoughts, is part romantic suspense, part legal thriller, part medical drama, part steamy erotic romp, and part screwball comedy.Victoria, Jillian, Brian, Jim, Caroline, and Rob are back in the 400-page next chapter in the Victoria Wilde series. Who will prevail in the Brookhart v. Grayson trial? Will Victoria have a boy or a girl, and will she finally find happiness? Will Rob figure out what the hell is going on with his mysterious and unstable boss, and will Brian find a career? Will you be able to get through the steamy chapters without tossing your e-reader to the floor and chasing your partner around the room?The answers to these and many, many other questions are found inside Second Thoughts.
author: Ian Dalton
